articles.title: Turn Back Your Biological Clock: “Life's Essential 8” May Make You 6 Years Younger - SciTechDaily
articles.description: An analysis of more than 6,500 adults found a clear link between high cardiovascular health — as measured by the American Heart Association’s Life’s Essential 8 checklist — and slower biological aging. After accounting for a range of socioeconomic factors, ad…
articles.content:
ByAmerican Heart AssociationNovember 9, 2023
Maintaining high cardiovascular health may result in slower biological aging and a longer, healthier life, according to a study to be presented at the AH… [+6101 chars]
